```{r}
library(pdftools)
library(magick)

## convert pdf's to png's
setwd(here::here("dev"))
pdfs <- list.files(here::here("dev"), pattern = "2020_.*pdf")

for(pdf in pdfs) {
  pdf_convert(pdf = here::here("dev", pdf), 
              format = "png", dpi = 200)
}

## convert png's to gif
system("magick.exe -delay 20 out*.png -loop 0 2020_37_Friends.gif")
```
